data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: My wife is a doctor. She ____ in a hospital ____ the ____ city ____ our ____ town. She ____ for ____ years ____ university ____ be a doctor. She ____ her ____. She also works very hard and for many hours every day.
data.partBlankContent: My wife is a doctor. She wo___ in a hospital i_ the b__ city ne__ our sm___ town. She stu____ for ma__ years a_ university t_ be a doctor. She lo___ her j__. She also works very hard and for many hours every day.
data.fullContent: My wife is a doctor. She works in a hospital in the big city near our small town. She studied for many years at university to be a doctor. She loves her job. She also works very hard and for many hours every day.
data.answer: 我妻子是医生。她在我们小镇附近的大城市的一家医院工作。为了成为一名医生，她在大学里学习了很多年。她热爱她的工作。她工作也很努力，每天都要工作好几个小时。
